page.description: Specify if the controls on the UX flow from left-to-right or right-to-left (select rtl for Hebrew and Arabic)

section.description: Here are three controls without toggle breaks.

section.title: left-to-right
section.description: When set to 'ltr' the controls will be left justified on the screen. The first control in the controls tree will be the furthest left.

section.title: right-to-left
section.description: When set to 'rtl' the controls will appear right justified on the screen. The first control in the controls tree will be the furthest to the right.
